In La Esperanza de San Pedro, Chiapas, in the midst of the Zapatista struggle, Sonia, a member of the community, is about to be married. Her dowry, a cow, has been delivered. Now, the EZLN (Zapatista Army) has a problem on their hands and the entire community must come together so that the voice of its members can be heard and respected; and so that duty may be overcome by love...
